displayName.text: Discover Boating® New York Boat Show®

formattedAddress: 625 W 34th St., New York, NY 10001, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Discover Boating® New York Boat Show®
Discover Boating® New York Boat Show®

adrFormatAddress: 625 W 34th St., New York, NY 10001, USA

originalText.text: An unmatched urban boat show that has improved, with more elevated hospitality offerings and presentations, over time. As a nautical enthusiast, life long and merchant marine professional salt my son And I religiously attend every year to explore new boat options. While Small to mid size leisure boat navel architecture has taken a unique turn they have been able to find a balance both attracting contemporary And traditionally styled one.

originalText.text: The grandeur of the space, the exquisiteness of the monstrous boats were a delight to see. Was family friendly as Kids were provided a mini pool for them to ride in mini pedal boats. The ease of walking around and no one pressing you to buy, all boats were accessible

text.text: The grandeur of the space, the exquisiteness of the monstrous boats were a delight to see. Was family friendly as Kids were provided a mini pool for them to ride in mini pedal boats. The ease of walking around and no one pressing you to buy, all boats were accessible

originalText.text: Always look forward to this show. And it didn't disappoint.

text.text: Always look forward to this show. And it didn't disappoint.

originalText.text:
The New York Boat Show is held at the Javitts Center in January every year.

If you are interested in sail boats, this is not a place for you as power boats rule the day at this venue. I’ve never seen much of any sail accessory booths or manufacturers. However, if power boats are your passion, this is a great place to be.

Lots of small and large booths hawking boat accessories and products to keep your engines running and your boat looking great. There is always a small presence of tackle companies as well.

Even though there are many boat makers, you can sometimes see a kayak company-this year they had those well appointed fishing kayaks displayed.

Plenty of corporate displays from engine companies.

Many local marinas and dealers are on hand displaying their boats. It’s a great place to compare an shop around...or, just dream.

Happy boating.

If my review was helpful please consider giving it a thumbs up.

Thank you.

originalText.text: We visited the January show. It's small with a limited amount of boats and vendors. I'm not sure it's worth the entry fee. The July show is so much better.

text.text: We visited the January show. It's small with a limited amount of boats and vendors. I'm not sure it's worth the entry fee. The July show is so much better.
